periods.name: Overnight

periods.name: Friday
periods.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain Showers then Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers between 11am and 1pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly sunny. High near 93, with temperatures falling to around 88 in the afternoon. South southwest wind 3 to 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%.
